articles.author: The Guardian
articles.title: Linda McMahon, wrestling industry billionaire, confirmed as US education secretary
articles.description: US Senate confirmed Trump ally and ex-wrestling executive as chief of department president wants dismantled
articles.content:
The US Senate has confirmed Linda McMahon as the nation’s next education secretary, entrusting the former wrestling executive with a department marked for dismantling by Donald Trump.
The 76-year-old billionaire businesswoman and longtime Trump ally ... [3291 chars]

articles.author: CBC.ca
articles.title: Trump airs fresh frustrations with Zelenskyy, as U.S. officials amplify pressure on Ukrainian leader
articles.description: U.S. President Donald Trump slammed Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy on Monday for suggesting that the end of Russia's war against Ukraine likely "is still very, very far away."
articles.content:
U.S. President Donald Trump slammed Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy on Monday for suggesting that the end of Russia's war against Ukraine likely "is still very, very far away."

articles.author: The Indian Express
articles.title: Days after Oval Office showdown, Trump claims - Zelenskyy ‘doesn’t want there to be peace’
articles.description: In a post on Truth Social, Donald Trump referenced an AP report in which Zelenskyy said the war's end remains "very, very far away," arguing that the Ukrainian leader "doesn't want there to be peace as long as he has America's backing."
articles.content:
While Donald Trump spoke of both Russian and Ukrainian soldiers dying, and the need to stop the war, Vlodymyr Zelenskyy insisted on calling Vladimir Putin a war criminal and kept trying to paint Russia as blindly aggressive. (AP/ PTI)

articles.author: GuelphToday
articles.title: Senate confirms McMahon to lead Education Department as Trump pushes to shut it down
articles.description: WASHINGTON (AP) — The Senate voted Monday to confirm former wrestling executive Linda McMahon as the nation’s education chief, a role that places her atop a department that President Donald Trump has vilified and vowed to dismantle.
articles.content:
WASHINGTON (AP) — The Senate voted Monday to confirm former wrestling executive Linda McMahon as the nation’s education chief, a role that places her atop a department that President Donald Trump has vilified and vowed to dismantle.

articles.author: Cable News Network
articles.title: The crypto president has some ideas for your tax dollars
articles.description: When President Donald Trump addresses the nation from Capitol Hill on Tuesday, he’ll get the first opportunityto sell Americans and Congress on his new proposal unveiled Sunday in a pair of social media posts more than an hour apart, that the US needs to create a strategic reserve of cryptocurrency.
articles.content:
